experience.title: experience
experience.description: I have been working as Software Engineer on Dorik Inc. since January 2023

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description: I have worked with Robotics, Automation and IoT Devices for a long time and have a good experience with these

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description: I have been solving programming problems & developing desktop softwares for 5 to 6 years and got into web application development for 4 years, mostly used PHP. But currently using MERN Stack for recent projects

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me
My point of interests are Software Development, Robotics, Automation, IoT Devices, Machine Learning and Web Applications. And I have been working on these for 5-6 years & have a good experience.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: I am very much interested to work with robotics or IoT devices. Also I am very passionate about Artificial Intelligence, I want to give robots the power of artificial intelligence. Sounds evil, right? ;) . Oh, let's talk about my personal interests, I love playing football, video games, travelling and also I am a foodie :D .

education.title: education
education.description: I have completed my B.Sc (Engineering) in Computer Science & Engineering. Currently looking forward to either doing my PhD or colaborating with any research lab of my interest.

sports.title: sports
sports.description: I am a die hard football lover, plays cricket, loves to swim and many more

favorite-games.title: favorite-games
favorite-games.description: My favourite games chess, monopoly, carrom & pool

0.title: AI-Directory WebApp
0.description: This is a web application where user can find various AI platform information. Developed with MERN Stack and have functionalities such as Admin Dashboard, Email Subscription, Sign up, Login, Data Submission, Bookmark etc. Live Demo:https: //ai-directory.vercel.app

1.title: Project Xero-Campus 2
1.description: This is one of my React Personal Projects I am currently developing using Next JS Full Stack, React on Node JS. This project is intended to manage any kind of educational institute with built-in features such as student management, class management, course management, notice board, result publication, institute management, etc. This utilizing technologies such as redix UI, MongoDB, Next Serverless API, Custom Theme System etc. [Note: this is an ongoing project so anything can be changed as demonstrated in the video]

2.title: ReachMe-Social Media
2.description: This social media website is built using PHP, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, featuring chat, posts, likes, comments, sharing, and media uploads. It includes friendlists, notifications, admin and moderator panels, utilizing technologies like jQuery, AJAX, MySQL, Bootstrap, Font Awesome, Google Fonts, and CKEditor.

3.title: Foodie-Restaurant Finder
3.description: This is a restaurant & food review and reccomendation website built using PHP, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, featuring restaurant search, reviews, ratings, and recommendations. It includes user profiles, friendlists, notifications, admin and moderator panels, utilizing technologies like jQuery, AJAX, MySQL, Bootstrap, Font Awesome, Google Fonts, and CKEditor.

4.title: Python Robot Controller
4.description: This is a python GUI to control a robot, this project is currently under a PhD research, so can't reveal much of it.

5.title: Python Robot Controller 2
5.description: This is another python GUI to control a bio-robotic sensory system, this project is currently under a PhD research, so can't reveal much of it.

6.title: Robotic Arm with Auto & Manual Control
6.description: I made an robotic arm controllable semi automatically or full manually by the control panel. I was initially planned to use glove control but lack of fund and materials/components forced me to implement the arm with the control panel instead of using a hand glove control.

7.title: NEUB CodeLand Forum Website
7.description: This was my first dynamic website project using php. This was a forum website for my university's programmers ccommunity

8.title: Automated Water Pump Controller
8.description: This is one of my IoT projects, I made this to control the water pump automatically based on the water level in the tank.

9.title: Game - Cave Advemture
9.description: This is a simple 2D game I made using Java Swing and AWT.

10.title: Internet Controlled Robotics Car
10.description: This is a robotic car that can be controlled via wifi locally and also can be controlled via internet from anywhere in the world.

11.title: Simple Calculator App
11.description: This is a simple calculator app I made using Java Swing and AWT.

12.title: Bank Management Application
12.description: This is a bank management app I made using Java Swing and AWT.

13.title: Demo Operating System
13.description: This is a demo operating system and file manager app I made using Java Swing and AWT.

1.title: Thesis Research
1.description: This is our thesis research, we trained an encoder decoder machine learning model to complete partially drawn shapes.
